resources.string: App Messaging of AppGallery Connect can be used to send relevant messages to target users actively using your app to encourage them to use key app functions.
App Messaging even allows you to customize how your messages look and the way they will be sent, and define events for triggering message sending to your users at the right momen
A pop-up message can have a title and body and contain an image and up to two buttons. It is a better choice for you to send rich information to your users.
A banner message is displayed on the top of the screen, containing a thumbnail and the message title and body. A user can tap the banner to access the specified page.
An image message only contains an image. For example, an image message can be a poster well designed to promote an activity. A user can tap the image to access the activity details page.

After the App Messaging SDK is integrated into app, the SDK automatically synchronizes in-app messages published on the AppGallery Connect server and determines whether to display a specific in-app message based on the validity of message period and trigger.

Users can tap an in-app message to access the destination specified during message creation. The App Messaging SDK reports the message display result to AppGallery Connect. Developers can view the statistics on message displays, taps, and conversion data in AppGallery Connect.
App Messaging types can be tested clicking relevant buttons.

Message display is triggered by specific events. For example, a news app can display headline news when a user opens the app. These actions in these cases are trigger events. A trigger event is required for each in-app message
App Messaging supports two types of trigger events: preset events and HUAWEI Analytics Kit events.
There are two preset events like AppLaunch and AppOnForeground.

There are two types event for Analytics kit event. Developers can use analytics kit events to trigger App Messaging.Also They can define custom event for app messaging.After create custom events,They can be called from Application.
